title: UNHCR: Nearly 100,000 displaced in recent weeks as violence spreads across northern Mozambique
description: UNHCR, the UN Refugee Agency, is gravely concerned as intensifying attacks on villages and the rapid spillover of the conflict into previously safe districts force tens of thousands of people to flee across northern Mozambique, with close to 100,000 displaced…
content:
UNHCR - United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees
Briefing notes
This is a summary of what was said by UNHCR's Mozambique Representative Xavier Creach - to whom quoted text may be attributed - … [+4762 chars]
